displayProperties.name: Live Fire Sale
displayProperties.description: Raid Banners sold from Hawthorne cost less.

displayProperties.name: Cast No Shadows
displayProperties.description: Dealing melee damage increases this weapon's handling and loads a small amount of ammo from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Generosity
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets while transcendent creates Orbs of Power for your allies.

displayProperties.name: The Perfect Fifth
displayProperties.description: Every five hits attaches a delayed detonation.

displayProperties.name: Resonant Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a resonant appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Prismatic Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a prismatic appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Beacons
displayProperties.description: While you are amplified, your Arc Special or Heavy ammo weapon final blows create a blinding explosion.

displayProperties.name: Physic
displayProperties.description: Rapidly healing allies grants you and your allies restoration for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Spindle
displayProperties.description: Threadling damage increases this weapon's damage.

displayProperties.name: Touch of Winter
displayProperties.description:
Your Glacier, Duskfield, and Coldsnap grenades have enhanced functionality.

Glacier Grenade: Adds a [Stasis] Stasis crystal and changes the formation.

Duskfield Grenade: Increases slow-field size and creates a small [Stasis] Stasis crystal on impact.

Coldsnap Grenade: Seekers duplicate after freezing a target and create a [Stasis] Stasis crystal on detonation.

displayProperties.name: Expanding Abyss
displayProperties.description: Void sources deal increased damage to weakened targets.

displayProperties.name: Argent Blade
displayProperties.description: While you have Armor Charge, dealing damage with a Sword consumes an Armor Charge and empowers your Sword for a short time, granting it bonus damage and energy charge rate.

displayProperties.name: Prismatic Transfer
displayProperties.description: When you cast your Super, each member of your fireteam with a Super type different than yours gains a bonus to weapon damage.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Transference
displayProperties.description:
Gain increased grenade and melee damage while transcendent.

Weapon final blows while transcendent refund Light and Dark energy after Transcendence ends.

displayProperties.name: Shieldcrush
displayProperties.description:
While you have Woven Mail, Frost Armor, or a Void Overshield, your melee recharges faster and deals increased damage.

While you are amplified or radiant, your grenade recharges faster and deals increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Substantially increases stats based on the currently equipped Super.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
• [Strand] increases airborne effectiveness.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Rime
displayProperties.description: Your Frost Armor has increased duration and maximum stack count.

displayProperties.name: Drengr's Lash
displayProperties.description: Activate your Barricade ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging the targets it hits.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped Super.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
• [Strand] increases airborne effectiveness.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Echoes of Glory
displayProperties.description:
Grants {var:99725286}% additional Failsafe vendor reputation from all sources. For each piece of armor equipped with this perk, this bonus increases to a maximum of {var:3772573538}% (3 pieces).

The class item from this set will contribute as though you were wearing {var:1637760185} pieces.

displayProperties.name: Arc Conductor
displayProperties.description: Heavy attacks surge lightning from the user.

displayProperties.name: Aggressive Frame
displayProperties.description:
Powerful, heavy swings.
[Heavy Attack]  : Slam.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Justice
displayProperties.description: While transcendent, your ability final blows explode.

displayProperties.name: Wave Sword Frame
displayProperties.description:
Heavy attack deploys a shockwave uppercut and launches the user into the air.

An immediate follow up swing after the uppercut deploys a homing strike that aggressively seeks a target.

displayProperties.name: Barrel Constrictor
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon significantly reduce its projectile spread for an improved duration.

displayProperties.name: Diamond Lance
displayProperties.description:
Shatter or defeat targets with abilities or [Stasis] Stasis weapons to create a Stasis lance.

[Shoot]  : Throw the lance to freeze targets on impact.

[Melee]  : Slam the lance to the ground to freeze targets in a small area.

displayProperties.name: Support Frame
displayProperties.description:
Flexible and agile frame capable of healing allies and hurting foes. Harming targets builds a restorative charge.

Hip firing at allies while this weapon is charged heals them, with rapid healing increasing weapon damage and bestowing restoration to your allies.

displayProperties.name: Paracausal Imbuement
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant Super energy. This weapon gains bonus damage once your Super expires.

displayProperties.name: The Fourth Magic
displayProperties.description: Weapon final blows boost grenade damage.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Courage
displayProperties.description: Your [Arc] Arc, [Solar] Solar, and [Void] Void abilities deal increased damage to targets afflicted with Darkness debuffs.

displayProperties.name: Property: Undecidable
displayProperties.description: Damage type matches your grenade.

displayProperties.name: Inverse Relationship
displayProperties.description:
When you deal damage with this weapon, it gains increased handling, takes reduced flinch, and movement speed is increased for a short time.

When you are at reduced health, this weapon deals additional damage.

displayProperties.name: Focused Fire
displayProperties.description: After a final blow with this weapon, [Alternate Weapon Action]  to return ammo to the magazine and swap to a tighter spread that deals increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Burst
displayProperties.description: Well-rounded, reliable, 3-round burst.

displayProperties.name: Sunfire Furnace
displayProperties.description: Create more Sunspots. Grenade and melee abilities charge faster with a charged Solar Super.

displayProperties.name: Crystalline Transistor
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows with Kinetic weapons create an explosion in the element of your equipped Super.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: THE END DRAWS NEAR
displayProperties.description: The air buzzes with anticipation. You feel an itch in your mind as the Witness bends the Light to its will, reshaping reality. Soon its power will be beyond your reckoning. It must be stopped.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Valor
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased melee ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Grace
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that randomly provides the effects of one of the other Pale Blessing mods.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Remedy
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased health regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Resurgence
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased grenade ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Facet
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased class ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Aegis
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides a regenerating overshield.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Insight
displayProperties.description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased Super ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: The Lost Voice
displayProperties.description: Healing grenades spawn a Restorative Turret.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Proliferation
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with any source of Strand damage produces Threadlings. Defeating powerful combatants produces more Threadlings.

displayProperties.name: String Theory
displayProperties.description: Hits against marked targets deal increased damage and have a chance to refund ammo to the magazine.

displayProperties.name: High Ground
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant stacks of bonus damage. Attacking targets from higher ground immediately grants the maximum number of stacks. Increases reload.

displayProperties.name: Cayde's Retribution
displayProperties.description: Acquire Orbs to fire Golden Gun shots.

displayProperties.name: Grave Robber
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows or dealing damage with a charged melee reloads this weapon's magazine from reserves.

displayProperties.name: Guardians United
displayProperties.description: When in a fireteam with a linked friend, increases experience gains up to level 50.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Blessing
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows start health regeneration. While transcendent, melee final blows start health regeneration for you and nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Circle of Life
displayProperties.description: Rapidly healing allies grants this weapon a period of increased damage.

displayProperties.name: To the Pain
displayProperties.description:
While this weapon is equipped, taking damage greatly increases handling and aim assist until the weapon is stowed.

Taking more damage increases the effect.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Traveler's Diffraction
displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with Void damage has a chance to create Void seekers that track nearby targets and suppress them.

displayProperties.name: Of Hawks and Pigeons
displayProperties.description: Raid rotator challenges grant Spoils of Conquest. Trials wins grant additional Trials reputation.

displayProperties.name: Osmosis
displayProperties.description: Using your grenade ability partially refills the magazine and changes this weapon's damage type to match your grenade until you stow it.

displayProperties.name: Eddy Current
displayProperties.description: Temporarily increases reload speed and handling after sprinting or while amplified; increased reload speed and handling have a longer duration. This effect is significantly improved when you are amplified.

displayProperties.name: Vortex Frame
displayProperties.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy spin attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

displayProperties.name: Offensive Bulwark
displayProperties.description:
While you have an Overshield or are inside Ward of Dawn, your grenade charges significantly faster, you have increased melee range and damage, and melee final blows restore a small portion of your Overshield and extend its duration.

You gain an additional shield throw while in Sentinel Shield.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Dark-Forged Trigger
displayProperties.description: Removes hipfire accuracy penalties while increasing rate of fire. At maximum stacks of Cranial Spike, hipfiring deals increased damage.

displayProperties.name: Radiant Orbs
displayProperties.description: While you have a Solar or Prismatic subclass equipped, picking up an Orb of Power makes you radiant.

displayProperties.name: Galvanic Armor
displayProperties.description: While you have an Arc or Prismatic subclass equipped, incoming damage from combatants is reduced while amplified.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Counter Energy
displayProperties.description: When you or a member of your fireteam stuns a champion, you gain energy for your least-charged ability.

displayProperties.name: Blade Stamina
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating combatants with a Sword refunds some ammo.

displayProperties.name: Void Hegemony
displayProperties.description: While you have a Void or Prismatic subclass equipped, defeating weakened targets provides a small Void Overshield.

displayProperties.name: Threat Remover
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with nearly all bullets in a spread increases reload speed, handling, and stability.

displayProperties.name: Dealer's Choice
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant a small amount of Super energy. Equipping multiple weapons from the Pale Heart increases this effect.

displayProperties.name: Special Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Special ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: Bleak Watcher
displayProperties.description: [Grenade]  : Hold to convert your grenade into a [Stasis] Stasis turret that fires slowing projectiles at nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Burst
displayProperties.description: Fires a three-round burst.

displayProperties.name: Archer's Gambit
displayProperties.description: Hipfire precision hits grant a massive draw speed bonus for an improved duration. Further precision hits extend the duration.

displayProperties.name: Well-Rested
displayProperties.description:
XP gains increased by 2x for your first {var:429946734} Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.

displayProperties.name: Stylostixis
displayProperties.description: Arcane Needle causes suspending detonations.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Command
displayProperties.description:
Freezing or suppressing a target reloads your equipped weapons and increases weapon stability, aim assist, and airborne effectiveness.

Defeating frozen or suppressed targets creates a Stasis Shard or Void Breach.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Ruin
displayProperties.description: Increases the size and damage of the burst when you shatter a Stasis crystal or frozen target, and increases the area of effect of Solar ignitions.

displayProperties.name: Knockout
displayProperties.description:
Critically wounding a target or breaking their shield infuses your melee attacks with Arc energy and increases your melee range and damage for a short time.

Defeating targets with melee attacks makes you amplified and restores a portion of your health. Defeating more powerful combatants increases the amount of health restored.

displayProperties.name: High Ground
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon grant stacks of bonus damage. Attacking targets from higher ground immediately grants the maximum number of stacks.

displayProperties.name: Facet of Awakening
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating targets with Light or Darkness damage or Super final blows generates an elemental pickup of the matching damage type.

displayProperties.name: Drengr's Lash
displayProperties.description: Activate Thruster to create an unstable knot of [Strand] Strand matter that detonates after a short delay, suspending and damaging targets.

displayProperties.name: Transcendent Duelist
displayProperties.description:
This weapon collects less ammo. Final blows with this weapon accelerate Light and Darkness mastery.
Deals increased damage while Transcendent; defeating targets lengthens Transcendence.

displayProperties.name: Iron Grip
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon stability at the cost of a reduced amount of reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Barrel Constrictor
displayProperties.description: Final blows with this weapon reduce its projectile spread for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Well of Radiance
displayProperties.description: Thrust your Sword into the ground, damaging and scorching nearby targets. The sword projects a continuous aura, granting radiant effects and restoration to nearby allies, protecting them from the effects of Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Song of Flame
displayProperties.description:
Unleash your inner fire, making your equipped weapons radiant and enhancing your abilities.

[Melee]  : Release a supercharged melee attack that launches additional projectiles.

[Grenade]  : Create a sentient flame wisp that seeks out targets and detonates in a scorching explosion, then seeks out other nearby targets.

While Song of Flame is active, you and nearby allies regenerate abilities more quickly, are more resistant to incoming damage, and your [Solar] Solar and Kinetic weapons scorch targets.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Metal
displayProperties.description: While holding down the trigger, every fourth bullet becomes a heavy projectile that makes targets volatile on impact.

displayProperties.name: Special Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Special ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: Permeability
displayProperties.description: Using your class ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your equipped Super until you stow the weapon.

displayProperties.name: Remote Shield
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a protective shield on impact. Passing through the protective shield provides a Void Overshield and improves weapon damage, reload speed, and handling.

displayProperties.name: Hydraulic Boosters
displayProperties.description: Buffs double jump, sprint, slide, & air hipfire.

displayProperties.name: Rapid-Fire Frame
displayProperties.description: Deep ammo reserves. Fast reload when empty.

displayProperties.name: Grave Robber
displayProperties.description: Melee final blows or dealing damage with a charged melee reloads this weapon's magazine from reserves. Improves handling.

displayProperties.name: Eddy Current
displayProperties.description: Temporarily increases reload speed and handling after sprinting or while amplified. This effect is improved when you are amplified.

displayProperties.name: Devouring Rift
displayProperties.description: While using a Void Super, your Empowering Rifts grant you Devour. Damage dealt from within them will disrupt combatants.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: Spark of Frequency
displayProperties.description: Melee hits increase your equipped weapon's reload speed and stability for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Tome of Dawn
displayProperties.description: Aiming in midair holds you in place while you have a Solar super equipped.

displayProperties.name: Golden Gun: Marksman
displayProperties.description:
Summon a precision flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Your Golden Gun deals massively increased precision damage, overpenetrates targets, and creates Orbs of Power on precision hits.

Benefits from being radiant.

displayProperties.name: Golden Gun: Deadshot
displayProperties.description:
Summon a rapid-fire flaming pistol that disintegrates targets with Solar Light.

Causing Solar ignitions while your Super is active refunds a Golden Gun round.

Benefits from being radiant.

displayProperties.name: In-Flight Compensator
displayProperties.description: Increases the airborne effectiveness of all equipped weapons.

displayProperties.name: Drengr's Lash
displayProperties.description: Activate your Barricade ability to create a ripple in reality that travels forward along the ground, suspending and damaging the targets it hits.

displayProperties.name: Harmonic Resonance
displayProperties.description: Equipping multiple weapons from this set grants this weapon increased reload speed and handling. It also deals increased damage versus targets wielding Light and Darkness.

displayProperties.name: Iron Gaze
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon target acquisition at the cost of a reduced amount of weapon range.

displayProperties.name: Permeability
displayProperties.description: Using your class ability changes this weapon's damage type to match your equipped Super until you stow the weapon. Improves handling.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Harvest
displayProperties.description:
Freezing targets creates [Stasis] Stasis shards around the frozen targets. Higher tier combatants create more shards.

While Glacial Harvest is equipped, picking up [Stasis] Stasis shards grants stacks of Frost Armor.

displayProperties.name: Looks Can Kill
displayProperties.description: This weapon fires shield-piercing ammunition and comes with a scope.

displayProperties.name: Winter's Shroud
displayProperties.description:
Dodging slows nearby targets.

Slowing targets briefly increases your class ability regeneration.

displayProperties.name: Tectonic Harvest
displayProperties.description:
Shattering a [Stasis] Stasis crystal or frozen target creates a [Stasis] Stasis shard. This shard grants melee energy when picked up by you or your allies.

While Tectonic Harvest is equipped, picking up [Stasis] Stasis shards grants stacks of Frost Armor.

displayProperties.name: Starless Night
displayProperties.description: Ward of Dawn blinds targets and grants bonus weapon damage. Guarding blinds.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: Dream Work
displayProperties.description: Once per reload, assists or assisted final blows partially refill the weapon from reserves and increase reload speed for a short duration. Bows receive faster draw time.

displayProperties.name: Special Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Special ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: Storm's Edge
displayProperties.description:
Summon an electrified dagger and throw it in your aim direction.

When the dagger hits a surface or a target, you blink to its location and perform a powerful whirling strike, damaging any nearby targets. Can be reactivated after the strike to perform additional throws.

If the dagger flies for long enough without impacting anything, it detonates and you blink to the detonation location.

displayProperties.name: Cryoclasm
displayProperties.description: Your slide distance is greatly increased. Sliding into [Stasis] Stasis crystals or frozen targets shatters them and any nearby frozen targets.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Burst
displayProperties.description: Fires a hard-hitting, two-round burst. Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming.

displayProperties.name: Ward of Dawn
displayProperties.description:
Create an indestructible dome to protect you and your allies.

While inside or near the Ward of Dawn, you and your allies gain a Void overshield.

displayProperties.name: Vexadecimal
displayProperties.description: Sustained fire weakens targets.

displayProperties.name: Chaos Accelerant
displayProperties.description:
[Grenade]  : Overcharge your grenade, making it deadlier and more effective.

Vortex Grenade: Increases the size and linger duration of the vortex.

Axion Bolt: Creates an additional seeker.

Scatter Grenade: Submunitions track to nearby targets.

Magnetic Grenade: Releases a short-range Void blast. Cooldown is reduced.

displayProperties.name: Ursine Guard
displayProperties.description: Guard with Sentinel Shield or Unbreakable for more Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Fortification
displayProperties.description: Replaces Barricade with a wall of Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.name: Adaptive Burst
displayProperties.description: Well-rounded, reliable, 3 round burst.

displayProperties.name: Grim Harvest
displayProperties.description:
Defeating slowed or frozen targets creates [Stasis] Stasis shards. These shards grant melee energy when picked up by you or your allies.

While Grim Harvest is equipped, picking up [Stasis] Stasis shards grants stacks of Frost Armor.

displayProperties.name: Precision Frame
displayProperties.description: Fires small auto-tracking missiles.

displayProperties.name: Prismatic Transfer
displayProperties.description: When you cast your Super, each member of your fireteam with a Super type different than yours gains a bonus to weapon damage.

displayProperties.name: Weaver's Call
displayProperties.description:
Activate your class ability to weave three Threadlings and deploy any Threadlings you have perched.

Targets defeated by [Strand] Strand damage have a chance to generate a perched Threadling.

displayProperties.name: Lightning Seeker
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot track targets across the ground, jolting them and unleashing chain lightning on impact.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Fractures
displayProperties.description: Shattering a frozen target with a melee attack grants a stack of Frost Armor.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Chains
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets while you have Frost Armor has a chance to create a [Stasis] Stasis shard.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Torment
displayProperties.description: You gain grenade energy each time you take damage from targets. Having Frost Armor increases the amount of energy gained.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Burst
displayProperties.description: Fires a hard-hitting, two-round burst. Slightly reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming.

displayProperties.name: Heavy Ammo Finder
displayProperties.description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

displayProperties.name: Restorative Turret
displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : When weapon energy is full, consume it before firing to make your next shot deploy a healing turret on impact that provides Cure and Restoration to nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Osmosis
displayProperties.description: Using your grenade ability partially refills the magazine and changes this weapon's damage type to match your grenade until you stow it. Handling is improved.

displayProperties.name: Radiant Light
displayProperties.description: Casting your Super causes nearby allies to also increase their current Armor Charge by 1. Allies that have a different Super element than you increase Armor Charge by 2.

displayProperties.name: Depths of Duskfield
displayProperties.description: Duskfield grenades have a larger effect and reduce the damage that allies take.

XP gains increased by 2x for your first 7 Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.
displayProperties.name: Well-Rested

displayProperties.description:
XP gains increased by 2x for your first 5 Season Ranks this week.

Completing Seasonal Challenges grants the most progress, followed by bounties and quests.
displayProperties.name: Well-Rested

displayProperties.description: A Broken Blade has been claimed from the EDZ.
displayProperties.name: Broken Blade

displayProperties.description: A Broken Blade has been claimed from Nessus.
displayProperties.name: Broken Blade

displayProperties.description: Broken Blades have been claimed from the EDZ, Throne World, and Nessus.
displayProperties.name: Broken Blade

displayProperties.description: A Broken Blade has been claimed from Savathûn's throne world.
displayProperties.name: Broken Blade
